name: ledScreen.scrollNumber
content: Creates a scrolling display of numbers using the LEDs on a continuous loop. Scroll will display from left to right.

examples.name: You are number one
examples.description: Displays the number 1 when you press the A Button

examples.name: Count Down and Up Timer
examples.description: Using the A and B button create a timer that will count down from 9 and count up from 1

palette_params.name: number
palette_params.description: The number used will be displayed as the value shown in the LED scroll. If the number is too large to be seen at one time it will read left to right.

short_description: Display scrolling numbers on the LED screen
tips:
When used without an `OnEvent` block, the scroll will repeat

Only numbers can be used
